paper_abstract: We show an 0*((l + 1)(n))-time algorithm for the channel assignment problem, where l is the maximum edge weight. This improves on the previous o*((l + 2)(n))-time algorithm by Kral (2005) [1], as well as algorithms for important special cases, like L(2, 1)-labeling. For the latter problem, our algorithm works in 0*(3(n)) time. The progress is achieved by applying the fast zeta transform in combination with the inclusion-exclusion principle. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Channel assignment via fast zeta transform
